TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: I have dedicated myself to research of the deadly matter, searching for any closure to the calamity that has befallen us.
CASSAVA: I was overjoyed to discover the survival of several aquatic species native to the star system, who were somehow insulated from the deadly matter's reach.
CASSAVA: From what I have learnt, I am certain the property of immersion I observed must be the reason for the continued survival of these species.
CASSAVA: But that means, if any of them were to ever return to the planet's surface... They would...
CASSAVA: What.. What a terrifying thought.. If it were not for <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep's</color> thick atmosphere, I am certain they would not have survived.
CASSAVA: I must be more vigilant in the future - I can only be grateful that <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep's</color> thick clouds has protected the native species from harm thus far.
